title: Textile, ca. 1820
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave foundation
dimensions:
Warp: 252cm (99in.). Weft: (selv.to selv.)  88cm (34 /4in.). 
All edges cut.
Height of repeat: 47cm (18 1/2in).
Width of roller: 85.5cm (33 3/4in.).
description: Design of hunters on horseback, dogs and deer all in isolated islands on a background of diagonal squares. In dark reddish brown on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-76.
